-- This script was generated by the ERD tool in pgAdmin 4.
-- Please log an issue at https://redmine.postgresql.org/projects/pgadmin4/issues/new if you find any bugs, including reproduction steps.
BEGIN;


CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public."Departamento"
(
    "IdDepartamento" integer NOT NULL,
    "Nombre" character varying COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    "Area" character varying COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    "IdEmpleado" integer,
    CONSTRAINT "Departamento_pkey" PRIMARY KEY ("IdDepartamento")
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public."Empleado "
(
    "IdEmpleado" integer NOT NULL,
    "Nombre" character varying COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    "Apellido" character varying COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    "Genero" boolean,
    "FechaNacimiento" date,
    "IdDepartamento" integer,
    CONSTRAINT "Empleado _pkey" PRIMARY KEY ("IdEmpleado")
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public."Salario"
(
    "IdSalario" integer NOT NULL,
    salario integer,
    "FechaInicio" date,
    CONSTRAINT "Salario_pkey" PRIMARY KEY ("IdSalario")
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public."Seguro"
(
    "IdSeguro" integer NOT NULL,
    "Tipo" character varying COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    "Importe" character varying COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    "FechaImporte" date,
    CONSTRAINT "Seguro_pkey" PRIMARY KEY ("IdSeguro")
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS public."Titulo"
(
    "IdTitulo" integer NOT NULL,
    titulo character varying COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    "Descripcion" character varying COLLATE pg_catalog."default",
    "IdEmpleado" integer,
    CONSTRAINT "Titulo_pkey" PRIMARY KEY ("IdTitulo")
);

ALTER TABLE IF EXISTS public."Empleado "
    ADD CONSTRAINT "Empleado _IdDepartamento_fkey" FOREIGN KEY ("IdDepartamento")
    REFERENCES public."Departamento" ("IdDepartamento") MATCH SIMPLE
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    NOT VALID;


ALTER TABLE IF EXISTS public."Titulo"
    ADD CONSTRAINT "Titulo_IdEmpleado_fkey" FOREIGN KEY ("IdEmpleado")
    REFERENCES public."Empleado " ("IdEmpleado") MATCH SIMPLE
    ON UPDATE NO ACTION
    ON DELETE NO ACTION
    NOT VALID;

END;
